bookText.htmlContent: Raccoon-morphs are extremely adaptable can be found in almost every corner of the Realm except the Endless Sea and perhaps the Mountains of the Moon. Their triangular ears, distinct "bandit-mask" markings, and ringed tails distinguish them from other morphs.

While all raccoon-morphs differ from one another individually, they have a reputation as adaptable scavengers. Their sensitive paws can discern by touch what average eyes fail to discern by sight. It is generally not recommended to try swindling a raccoon-morph with counterfeit goods and consequently many raccoon-morphs make their living in fields where either knowing how to spot fakes or how to produce convincing ones are vital skills.

Like most other races, raccoon-morphs are affected by arcane storms and experience heightened libidos. Unlike other races, however, raccoons that have been exposed to arcane lightning up close salivate uncontrollably which tends to form a sort of foam around their mouths, and their hands become sensitive erogenous zones.

A raccoon-morph's offspring will be a mixture of raccoon-morphs and offspring of their partner's race.
